title: Referral program
about: How can you earn with our referral program?
description: <0>Recomend our site to others and earn:</0><1>5% from every donation from your referral</1><2>5% from total earned of each stream from your referral</2><3>If your referral also used our partner program, you will get:</3><4>2,5% from every donation from user invited by your referral</4><5>2,5% from total earned of each stream from your user invited by your referral</5><6>Just tell about Potok to your subscribers or friends, give them your referral link and start earning lifetime profit from each of their deposits or streams!</6><7>You earn money from both new viewers and streamers which will surely appear and start fiving lifetime profit.</7>
